text:
Contact the Random House Speakers Bureau at 212-572-2013.  

You can also email them at rhspeakers@randomhouse.com.  

A full profile of Greg McKeown is available online.  

Video footage of Greg McKeown can be found at www.rhspeakers.com.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Greg McKeown offers a strategic framework for living and leading as an Essentialist through engaging keynote speeches and workshops.
